1114853164954656769.text: About the only living tissue on the internet is the blockchain space. That's technology which is *about something* rather than just being technology for the sake of profit. Instagram changed some people's lives, but it didn't change why they were alive. Blockchain makes meaning.

1117796215733805056.text: Absolute pleasure to work on this project. We built something legit, can't wait to see what we can do in the next month.  Great to meet the @Givethio community for the first time!https://twitter.com/Givethio/status/1117503763693166593 …

1116294795448786946.text: Augmented bonding curves have the potential to redefine the way we “crowdfund for social good”. Great explanation by @abbey_titcomb on what @Givethio Is trying to achieve at @OdysseyHack.https://link.medium.com/njMJgmAxNV

1114517155075231744.text: Excited to be part of the @Givethio team at the @OdysseyHack! We will be working to implement some of @mZargham system design research to see if we can create a sustainable funding mechanism for the commons.https://twitter.com/block_science/status/1114281645421531136 …

1035107629633351680.text: Wow, great talk @mikko. Scary topic. In the future everything will be online, whether we like it or not. How are these devices going to handle internet failure events? Hopefully not like this oven! #MyDatapic.twitter.com/ETKVhI8K1B
